RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-Winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLL DEM BONES set a pressured pace into the far turn shaking clear on the inside in upper stretch holding sway to wire. HARTEL gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn racing four wide down the lane responding late to salvage place. VENEZUELANDREAMERS saved ground rallying on the far turn chasing while angling off the rail in upper stretch hanging late. OMEGA GOLD lost ground coming six wide itno upper stretch giving modest response to pass a few there. BOURBON TALKING saved ground throughout never reaching contention. QUANTUM THEORY lost ground throughout playing no factor. CHEEKY CHAPS was never involved. PRIVATE CONNIE faded into the far turn. ANGELUS DIAMOND was always outrun. WILD WINE sent hard pressed the pace into the far turn wavering there fading to upper stretch.

ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, gained far turn, vied off inside lane, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOOMIN GOOSE prompted the pace to the far turn sweeping past the pacesetter to lead in upper stretch digging in gamely under outside pressure. KNOWN went evenly to the far turn firing into upper stretch pressing the winner hard the final eighth. WHISKEY SUNRISE raced a step slow coming five wide into upper stretch picking up the others from mid track with an even finish. HOLY TRUTH slow early swung out seven wide in upper stretch finishing evenly. QUESTION AUTHORITY tracked the pace to the far turn weakening along the inside down the lane. PERFECT PICTURE set a pressured pace to the far turn being overpowered into upper stretch giving way on the inside. HE'S THE SOUPERWON hustled along wilted abruptly into upper stretch being put away there.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung 7 wide lane, evenly,

ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, ceded into lane, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 67. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Estimating Allowances) (Winners for a Claiming Price of $15,000 or more Preferred). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNIFICENT MADDY bobbled slightly after the break making a clear lead early speeding off down the lane while full of run. ABUNDANT STORY slow early raced inside to upper stretch rallying while angling out a bit coming on to save place. MACHEN REIGNS chased early then weakened on the turn racing six wide into upper stretch angling in a touch while finishing evenly. LIL BOUGIE chased close up through the turn then was dispatched by the winner in upper stretch weakening late near mid track. XTRAORDINARYMOTION raced evenly off the pace lacking more. LIL BUNNY gave early retreat. S S CITY SCOUT bore out badly easing on the turn jogging to the wire walking off after the race.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, inside to lane, angled out, saved place

ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 5-6 wide lane, weakened,

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled after break, sped clear, drew off full of run

ENTRY.NAME: S S City Scout
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out badly, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Machen Reigns
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, wide into lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT FOR MYSELF veered in causing traffic at the break, chased from there extending four wide in upper stretch pressing the leader late getting a nose down on the wire. RUN KITTY away alertly set the pace through the turn widening in upper stretch being engaged late missing on the wire. LOVE GONE WILD chased close up through the turn weakening in upper stretch. DA JOURNEYGIRL was crowded and bumped at the break. MISTY MIDNIGHT was in tight at the break. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF MISTY MIDNIGHT AGAINST THE RIDER OF OUT FOR MYSELF CLAIMING INTERFERENCE AT THE START WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened top lane, hooked late just missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded bumped start

ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight at the break

IN TO THE NIGHT slow early lost ground to upper stretch hitting stride a sixteenth out surging late seven wide. OOPSIE DOOPSIE slow early raced five wide into upper stretch having some response late gaining near mid track. ONE MORE NIGHT set a pressured pace dueling on the inside of rival through the turn then down the stretch being overwhelmed late from the outside. WANDA SUSIE DOOZY pressured the pace dueling abreast through the turn then down the stretch weakening under outside pressure late. MISS JOANNIE chased early then weakened on the turn fading in upper stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $17,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OBIWAN hustled out set the pace through the far turn angling out sharply in mid stretch holding under a drive in the seven path. STAR ENTERTAINER brushed at the break lagged to the far turn, rallied there chasing to upper stretch losing path in mid stretch angling inside saving place. ESCAPE VELOCITY stalked the pace losing ground to upper stretch vying there seven and eight wide. THRU THE VINE went evenly through the far turn bidding from mid track in upper stretch angling inside mid stretch lacking late punch. DYRDEK tracked evenly chasing on the far turn tiring down the lane. CATFISH folded up early. OBJECTIONS FROM THE RIDER AND TRAINER OF STAR ENTERTAINER AGAINST THE RIDER OF OBIWAN FOR INTERFERENCE IN MID STRETCH WERE DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

GOLD PASS pressed the pace carrying a short lead on the turn shaking clear along the rail in upper stretch being run down late. BELLA BASORA chased the pace to upper stretch extending in the three path there rallying late.
